func:
fname = msg.payload.fname
mname = msg.payload.mname
lname = msg.payload.lname
dept_work = msg.payload.dept_work
contact_no = msg.payload.contact_no
hire_date = Date.parse(msg.payload.hire_date);
job = msg.payload.job
ed_level = msg.payload.ed_level
sex = msg.payload.sex
DOB = Date.parse(msg.payload.DOB);
emp_title = msg.payload.emp_title
emp_salary = msg.payload.emp_salary
emp_commision = msg.payload.emp_salary
nationality = msg.payload.nationality
id_card_no = msg.payload.id_card_no
msg.payload = {fname,mname,lname,dept_work,contact_no,hire_date,job,ed_level,sex,DOB,emp_title,emp_salary,emp_commision,nationality,id_card_no}
return msg;

query: insert into Users(user_id,user_name,email,password,user_type)values(Select emp_no from Employees where id_card_no=@id_card_no,'user6@user.com','user6','user');
